headline: VICI Properties Inc. Announces Release Date For Third Quarter 2025 Results
summary: NEW YORK, September 29, 2025--VICI Properties Inc. (NYSE: VICI) ("VICI Properties" or the "Company") announced today that it will release its third quarter 2025 financial results on Thursday, October 30, 2025 after the close of trading on the New York Stock Exchange. The Company will host a conference call and audio webcast on Friday, October 31, 2025 at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Time (ET).
